mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(reviewno, title, review, rate, rdate, payno, memberno, filmno) VALUES (review_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{review}, #{rate}, sysdate, #{payno}, #{memberno}, #{filmno})
mapper.select: SELECT m.memberno as m_memberno, m.nick, m.memthumb, r.title, r.review, r.rate, r.rdate, r.payno, r.memberno r_memberno, r.filmno FROM member m , review r WHERE m.memberno = r.memberno AND r.filmno = #{filmno} ORDER BY r.rdate DESC
